This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: May 24th, 2007 in Kokomo at Meijers parking lot...6 bright lights in west sky by Venus
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in the Meijers parking lot in Kokomo, on May 24th. I was talking on my cell phone, facing west. It was about 9:25pm. I was looking at Venus, and it wasn't quite dark yet, and a little cloud cover. All of a sudden a bright light appeared below Venus...then it shot straight above Venus. Then 5 bright light appeared in a diagnial line to the right of Venus and the first light. I just knew it couldn't be planes or helicoptors, balloons etc. I'm a photographer, and dropped the phone, and grabbed my camera. By the time I got out of the car, they had dissapeared. So I didn't get a picture at all. I had hung up on my girlfriend, and when I called her back, I had to leave her a message on what happened. She got a kick out of it, and I think she still has my message on her phone. Which also has the exact time. I just had another experience on July 10th, which I will submit next. I have a picture on that one that I took in Tipton Co.
